definition: to repair (sth broken)/to restore (sth damaged)/to establish friendly relations with/(literary) to do meritorious deeds
to decorate/to embellish/to repair/to build/to write/to cultivate/to study/to take (a class)
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to

sentences.english: I have been told my car is a complete write-off , impossible to repair.
sentences.chinese: 我已經告訴你我的汽車已經報廢了，根本不可能修好。

sentences.english: Just then an old man came and helped me. A few minutes later, he mended the bike well.
sentences.chinese: 這時一個老邁爺走過來幫我，幾分鐘後車修好了。

sentences.english: It took Mr. Wang about three hours to put the TV set right yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天王師傅花了大約三個小時才把那臺電視機修好。

sentences.english: Oecolampadius sought to bring the two together by pointing out the common ground.
sentences.chinese: 艾科蘭巴迪試圖讓雙方修好，他指出他們共同的立場。

sentences.english: After days of hard work, the culvert was at last completed.
sentences.chinese: 經過幾天的苦戰，高低把涵洞修好了。

sentences.english: Integrity and the driver of the tractor repaired, small weeks without village to find schumann.
sentences.chinese: 正直和司機小周把拖拉機修好，沒有進村去找舒曼。

sentences.english: He looks flat-footed and he can not repair the broken flat iron well.
sentences.chinese: 他看起來笨手笨腳哦，他無法把這個壞了的熨斗修好。

sentences.english: If your dest is broken, you should fix it up .
sentences.chinese: 如果你的書桌壞了，你應該把它修好。

sentences.english: Dear, I promise I will fix it uo in a while.
sentences.chinese: 親愛的，我保證很快把它修好。

sentences.english: So why not fix the power grid and the refrigerators?
sentences.chinese: 那麼爲什麼不修好電路和冰箱呢？

sentences.english: After a check Yu Xiaoji finally fix the faucet.
sentences.chinese: 經過一番檢查餘小奇總算修好了水龍頭。

sentences.english: How were you able to fix that scratch?
sentences.chinese: 你怎麼修好那個劃痕的？

sentences.english: The mechanics went places on the damaged car; still they didn't fix it before the boss came back.
sentences.chinese: 修理工賣力修那破車，可是老闆回來了他們仍沒修好。

sentences.english: Can you finish repairing the car by Saturday?
sentences.chinese: 你能在星斯六之前把車修好嗎？

sentences.english: He helped to hold the chair and drive nails. Soon it was fixed.
sentences.chinese: 他幫着扶椅子，釘釘子，一會兒就修好了。

definition: to decorate/to embellish/to repair/to build/to write/to cultivate/to study/to take (a class)
to repair/to fix/to prune/to trim/(coll.) to sort sb out/to fix sb
to repair/to refurbish/to renovate/to refit/to mend/to rebuild
to finish work/to complete a project
to spruce up/to renovate/to tend (a garden)/to groom (one's hair)/to finish (a rough surface)/to trim (a lawn)/to touch up (a photo)
to repair in a rush/rush repairs
